messages.title: Only one Party will:
messages.content: Stop another divisive independence referendum, Oppose the Conservatives’ damaging hard Brexit, Invest in Scottish education and mental health

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet states a commitment to stopping another independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Oppose the Conservatives’ damaging hard Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet promises to oppose the hard Brexit position of the Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Scottish education and mental health
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The pledge includes investment in Scottish education and enhancing mental health services.

issues.brexitEurope: Oppose the Conservatives’ damaging hard Brexit
